ticket.title: rails/lib/fcgi_handler.rb calls Dispatcher.reset_application!
ticket.original-body:
In rails 2.3.4, the fcgi_handler calls Dispatcher.reset_application!
However, Dispatcher doesn't have a reset_application! method -- it went away in rails 2.0 according to posts like: http://www.ruby-forum.com/topic/159026
This means that ror stops responding at times with an error 500.
ticket.latest-body:

This means that ror stops responding at times with an error 500.

This means that ror stops responding at times with an error 500.

However, Dispatcher doesn't have a reset_application! method -- it went away in rails 2.0 according to posts like: http://www.ruby-forum.com/topic/159026
This means that ror stops responding at times with an error 500.
version.body-html:
In rails 2.3.4, the fcgi_handler calls Dispatcher.reset_application!

However, Dispatcher doesn't have a reset_application! method -- it went away in rails 2.0 according to posts like: http://www.ruby-forum.com/topic/159026

This means that ror stops responding at times with an error 500.
version.title: rails/lib/fcgi_handler.rb calls Dispatcher.reset_application!

version.body: @@@ text [06/Nov/2009:04:02:12 :: 29488] Dispatcher failed to catch: undefined method `reset_application! version.title: rails/lib/fcgi_handler.rb calls Dispatcher.reset_application!

version.body: Sorry, forgot to say where that was from: My log/fastcgi.crash.log
version.body-html: Sorry, forgot to say where that was from: My log/fastcgi.crash.log
version.title: rails/lib/fcgi_handler.rb calls Dispatcher.reset_application!

version.body:
As far as I can tell, the FastCGI handler has been removed from Rails, also doing a `grep` for `reset_application!` shows that the method isn't being called anywhere within Rails.
I think this ticket can safely be closed.
version.body-html:
As far as I can tell, the FastCGI handler has been removed from Rails, also doing a grep for reset_application! shows that the method isn't being called anywhere within Rails.

I think this ticket can safely be closed.
version.title: rails/lib/fcgi_handler.rb calls Dispatcher.reset_application!
